adventure_overview: T ​ ​ he sleeper , over the falls, walk the dog, and around the ​ world are ​ just some of the tricks to learn with a yo – yo . Did you know that there are world champions of yo – yo ? There are professional yo – yo champions who tour the world giving demonstrations and competing. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved.

content.value: Learn the safety rules of using a yo-yo and always follow them.

requirements.text: Learn the safety rules of using a yo-yo and always follow them.

activities.name: Yo… Yo… Be Safe
activities.description: Cub Scouts  review the basic safety rules for using a yo-yo.

content.value: Discover how to find the proper yo-yo string length for you.

requirements.text: Discover how to find the proper yo-yo string length for you.

activities.name: Aye String
activities.description: Cub Scouts  find the proper length of string for a yo-yo.

content.value: Explain why it is important to have the correct string length and to be in the right location before throwing a yo-yo.

requirements.text: Explain why it is important to have the correct string length and to be in the right location before throwing a yo-yo.

activities.name: Right Length
activities.description: Cub Scouts  learn the importance of having the correct string length and how to select a safe location before throwing a yo-yo.

content.value: Demonstrate how to properly string a yo-yo and how to create a slip knot.

requirements.text: Demonstrate how to properly string a yo-yo and how to create a slip knot.

activities.name: Oh Knots
activities.description: Cub Scouts  learn how to properly string a yo-yo and how to create a slip knot.

content.value: Conduct the pendulum experiment with a yo-yo. Explain what happens to the yo-yo when the string is longer.

requirements.text: Conduct the pendulum experiment with a yo-yo. Explain what happens to the yo-yo when the string is longer.

activities.name: Swinging
activities.description: Cub Scouts  conduct  the  pendulum experiment with a yo-yo.

content.value: Show that you can properly wind a yo-yo.

requirements.text: Show that you can properly wind a yo-yo.

activities.name: All Wound Up
activities.description: Cub Scouts  show how to properly wind a yo-yo.

content.value: Attempt each of the following: gravity pull, sleeper, breakaway.

requirements.text: Attempt each of the following: gravity pull, sleeper, breakaway.

activities.name: Yo-Yo Ninja
activities.description: Cub Scouts  attempt each of the following yo-yo tricks: the gravity  pull , the sleeper, and the breakaway.
